Class RuleValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.client.validator.TableExtractionValidator
      • com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.client.validator.RuleValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    public class RuleValidator
extends TableExtractionValidator
    Defines validator for validating a value with given rules defined for a table.
